bug.author: mzmssg
bug.description:
Organization Name: Microsoft Short summary about the issue/question: RM get stuck, can't respond to any request. How to reproduce it: Not sure OpenPAI Environment:
OpenPAI version: 0.10, but it may be always there.
: These is a similar issue: <denchmark-link:https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/YARN-8513?page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels%3Aall-tabpanel>https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/YARN-8513?page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels%3Aall-tabpanel</denchmark-link>
And this is the workaround: <denchmark-link:https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/YARN-8896>https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/YARN-8896</denchmark-link>
